options.label: wordcloud
options.fig.cap: The two wordclouds share similar top words, and it's hard to determine from this how the sentiment changes between the two episodes. As there are 1454 words utilized throughout both episodes, the top 30 may not be highly informative.

options.label: unnamed-chunk-150
options.code-summary: Code: Create log graph of sentiment difference
options.fig.cap: The log difference for each sentiment catagory. Positive numbers mean a greater frequency during the finale.
